[{"text":"----Premise----","bold":true},{"text":"
This datapack aims to do a few things:","color":"dark_red","bold":false},{"text":"
1)Emphasize survival.","bold":false},{"text":"
2)Fill holes in the vanilla  game.","bold":false},{"text":"
3)Improve QOL...","bold":false},{"text":"
All while not disrupting sandbox vanilla gameplay!","bold":false},{"text":"
Welcome to","italic":true},{"text":"
TRUE SURVIVAL"},{"text":"

Click for more info.","color":"dark_blue","bold":false,"italic":true,"underlined":true,"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":[{"text":"Open page 8."}]},"clickEvent":{"action":"change_page","value":"16"}}]

[{"text":"----Healing----","bold":true},{"text":"
True Survival reworks Healing from the ground up.","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":true},{"text":"
‚ûä Throw a log onto a campfire to heal 3 hearts over 15 seconds.
‚ûã Maintain 16+ hunger in high light to heal you over several minutes.
‚ûå Don't forget vanilla options and new items! ","bold":false}]

[{"text":"----Lighting----","bold":true},{"text":"
Torches and lighting are reworked!","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":true},{"text":"
‚ûä Light sticks or wood tools on a campfire for 1 Torch.","bold":false},{"text":"
‚ûã Craft 4 Torches with a stick, coalcharcoal, and","bold":false},{"text":" kindling","color":"dark_blue","bold":false,"italic":true,"underlined":true,"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":[{"text":"Open page 8."}]},"clickEvent":{"action":"change_page","value":"7"}},{"text":"."},{"text":"
‚ûå Craft 6 torches by using blaze powder instead of kindling.","bold":false}]

[{"text":"----Lighting----","bold":true},{"text":"
TIPS: Undead can trample torches.","color":"dark_red","bold":false,"italic":true},{"text":"
Kindling:"},{"text":"
- grass
- seagrass
- vine
- fern
- moss carpet
- paper
- dried kelp","bold":false}]

[{"text":"----Cravings----","bold":true},{"text":"
Sleeping consumes hunger, but also grants a craving. Satisfy it to gain rewards.","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":true},{"text":"
CATEGORIES:","color":"dark_red","bold":false,"italic":true},{"text":"
‚ûä Baked Goods
‚ûã Fruits
‚ûå Golden
‚ûç Liquids
‚ûé Proteins
‚ûè Trash
‚ûê Veggies","bold":false}]

[{"text":"----Nomads----","bold":true},{"text":"
New Wandering Traders aid in exploration and emeralds!","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":true},{"text":"
TIP: Using horns gives Nomads glowing and they'll play their own horn as a signal.","color":"dark_red","bold":false,"italic":true},{"text":"
Types:"},{"text":"
‚ûä Spelunker
‚ûã Strider Jockey
‚ûå Voyager","bold":false}]

[{"text":"---Converting---","bold":true},{"text":"
Illagers can be converted to unique villagers.","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":true},{"text":"
To convert, give them weakness and use a name tag.","bold":false},{"text":"
‚ûä Vindicator ‚Ä£ Lumberjack (Uses Grindstone)
‚ûã Evoker ‚Ä£ Artisan (Uses cartography table)","bold":false}]

[{"text":"----Armor----","bold":true},{"text":"
True Survival armor has sets and reworks!","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":true},{"text":"
‚ûä Leather: Speed and immunity to creeper slowness.
‚ûã Chainmail: Craftable, and immunity to zombie bites.
‚ûå Gold: Haste
‚ûç Dia/Neth chestplates use more hunger.","bold":false}]

[{"text":"----Wood----","bold":true},{"text":"
Wood income has reworked progression!","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":true},{"text":"
‚ûä Fortune on axes will yield increased planks.

‚ûã Lumberjack villagers sell various wood trades. To hire one, ","bold":false},{"text":"convert","color":"dark_blue","bold":false,"italic":true,"underlined":true,"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":[{"text":"Open page 10."}]},"clickEvent":{"action":"change_page","value":"10"}},{"text":" a vindicator.","bold":false}]

[{"text":"---Workbench---","bold":true},{"text":"
Several items are crafted at the Artisan's workbench.","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":true},{"text":"
‚ûä To assemble, place an item frame on a crafting table. Then, place The Dev Diary into the frame.

‚ûã Right click to use. Break the crafting table to disassemble.","bold":false}]

[{"text":"--Progression--","bold":true},{"text":"
End Progression has been integrated with emeralds!","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":true},{"text":"
‚ûä There are several new ways to acquire emeralds like Nomads, or looting.
‚ûã Progression now requires emeraalds. Refer to your in-game recipe book for more.","bold":false},{"text":"
Click for more info.","color":"blue","bold":false,"italic":true,"underlined":true,"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":[{"text":"Open page 8."}]},"clickEvent":{"action":"change_page","value":"16"}}]

[{"text":"--Mob Difficulty--","bold":true},{"text":"
True Survival reworks bosses and regular mobs!","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":true},{"text":"
‚ûºNew mob abilities have been implemented to emphasize survival, difficulty, and outplay.
‚ûºNatural discovery is recommended, but visit the wiki if stuck. Good luck!","bold":false},{"text":"

Click for more info.","color":"dark_blue","bold":false,"italic":true,"underlined":true,"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":[{"text":"Open page 15."}]},"clickEvent":{"action":"change_page","value":"16"}}]

[{"text":"---Learn More---","bold":true},{"text":"
‚ûº All new recipes are added to the in-game recipe book!
‚ûº True Survival is a datapack with 100+ features, creating a comprehensive gamemode.
‚ûº The wiki is the best resource for everything True Survival.","bold":false},{"text":"
